text: Entezami (Persian: انتظامی, adjective form of Persian/Arabic انتظام (intiẓām) meaning "discipline", "order") is a Persian surname and may refer to: * Ali Akbar Entezami (1943–2015), Iranian chemist * Ezzatolah Entezami (1924–2018), Iranian actor * Majid Entezami (born 1948), Iranian musician, composer, conductor, and oboist == See also == * Entezam Category:Persian-language surnames
title: Entezami
